summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1891, for the improvement of Keystone Place and Keystone Place produced, from North Fiftieth Street to North Fifty-fifth Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, together with all necessary crosswalks and surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19559, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
